title: Primer on Flat Rolling, Second Edition
description:
2013 | ISBN: 0080994180 | English | 450 pages | PDF | 12 MB

Primer on Flat Rolling is a fully revised second edition, and the outcome of over three decades of involvement with the rolling process. 

It is based on the authors yearly set of lectures, delivered to engineers and technologists working in the rolling metal industry. 

The essential and basic ideas involved in designing and analysis of the rolling process are presented.
